nodes.documentation: Emitted when an new worker be added.
nodes.name: AddWorker

nodes.documentation: Emitted when a worker be removed.
nodes.name: RemoveWorker

nodes.documentation: Emitted when the admin call the statsInterest
nodes.name: StatsInterest

nodes.documentation:
Add new worker to the system.
Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
Emits a {AddWorker} event.
nodes.name: addWorker

nodes.documentation:
Remove a existed worker from system.
Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
Emits a {RemoveWorker} event.
nodes.name: removeWorker

nodes.documentation: Check an address whether the worker.
nodes.name: isWorker

nodes.documentation:
Stats the interest that all workers earned yesterday and distributed by the ratio of balance of all addresses.
Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
Emits a {StatsInterest} event.
nodes.name: statsInterest

nodes.documentation: Set the fee when withdraw money. The unit of the param is 1/10000. And the param should greater than 0 and less than 100 (0 - 1%)
nodes.name: setWithdrawFee

nodes.documentation: Set the upper limit of worker's balance.
nodes.name: setWorkerBalanceLimit

nodes.documentation: Set the upper limit of user's balance.
nodes.name: setUserBalanceLimit

nodes.documentation: Set the upper limit per tx.
nodes.name: setTxUpperLimit

nodes.documentation: Set the lower limit per tx.
nodes.name: setTxLowerLimit

nodes.documentation: Set the upper limit when withdraw
nodes.name: setWithdrawnUpperLimit

nodes.documentation: Change the owner of the contract. If the address is a contract, the contract should be IAdmin.
nodes.name: changeOwner

nodes.documentation:
When a user didn't receive the amount after he withdrew, he can submit an appeal.
Admin call this function to refund.
Emits a {AdminAppealRefund} event.
nodes.name: appealRefund

attributes.documentation: Emitted when an new worker be added.
attributes.name: AddWorker

attributes.documentation: Emitted when a worker be removed.
attributes.name: RemoveWorker

attributes.documentation: Emitted when the admin call the statsInterest
attributes.name: StatsInterest

attributes.documentation:
Add new worker to the system.
Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
Emits a {AddWorker} event.
attributes.name: addWorker

attributes.documentation:
Remove a existed worker from system.
Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
Emits a {RemoveWorker} event.
attributes.name: removeWorker

attributes.documentation: Check an address whether the worker.
attributes.name: isWorker

attributes.documentation:
Stats the interest that all workers earned yesterday and distributed by the ratio of balance of all addresses.
Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
Emits a {StatsInterest} event.
attributes.name: statsInterest

attributes.documentation: Set the fee when withdraw money. The unit of the param is 1/10000. And the param should greater than 0 and less than 100 (0 - 1%)
attributes.name: setWithdrawFee

attributes.documentation: Set the upper limit of worker's balance.
attributes.name: setWorkerBalanceLimit

attributes.documentation: Set the upper limit of user's balance.
attributes.name: setUserBalanceLimit

attributes.documentation: Set the upper limit per tx.
attributes.name: setTxUpperLimit

attributes.documentation: Set the lower limit per tx.
attributes.name: setTxLowerLimit

attributes.documentation: Set the upper limit when withdraw
attributes.name: setWithdrawnUpperLimit

attributes.documentation: Change the owner of the contract. If the address is a contract, the contract should be IAdmin.
attributes.name: changeOwner

attributes.documentation:
When a user didn't receive the amount after he withdrew, he can submit an appeal.
Admin call this function to refund.
Emits a {AdminAppealRefund} event.
attributes.name: appealRefund

addWorker(address).notice: Add new worker to the system. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {AddWorker} event.

appealRefund(address).notice: When a user didn't receive the amount after he withdrew, he can submit an appeal. Admin call this function to refund. Emits a {AdminAppealRefund} event.

changeOwner(address).notice: Change the owner of the contract. If the address is a contract, the contract should be IAdmin.

isWorker(address).notice: Check an address whether the worker.

removeWorker(address).notice: Remove a existed worker from system. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {RemoveWorker} event.

setTxLowerLimit(uint256).notice: Set the lower limit per tx.

setTxUpperLimit(uint256).notice: Set the upper limit per tx.

setUserBalanceLimit(uint256).notice: Set the upper limit of user's balance.

setWithdrawFee(uint256).notice: Set the fee when withdraw money. The unit of the param is 1/10000. And the param should greater than 0 and less than 100 (0 - 1%)

setWithdrawnUpperLimit(uint256).notice: Set the upper limit when withdraw

setWorkerBalanceLimit(uint256).notice: Set the upper limit of worker's balance.

statsInterest(uint256).notice: Stats the interest that all workers earned yesterday and distributed by the ratio of balance of all addresses. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {StatsInterest} event.
